item.title: Book: The wee free men
item.description: Book: The wee free men # The Wee Free Men are very little men who like “to fight, to drink and to drink and fight” (well, so they say…!). Well, but the main character is Tiffany, at the beginning of the book she slais Jenny green-teeth with a friyng pan (for Jenny and all other fairies iron is very painful because iron is made by humans, not by nature - well, thats the short explanation), which seems to be very impressive to other witches.
